functional_jobs.job_statement: When navigating the website, I want to easily find event information and registration options, so I can participate in community activities without frustration.
functional_jobs.current_solution: The current website provides event information but is difficult to navigate and outdated in design.
pain_points: Lack of self-service options for common inquiries.
desired_outcomes: A user-friendly website with a modern design.
Quick access to event registration and participation information.
A better calendar app for browsing and searching events.
success_criteria: Increased user engagement with the website.
Positive feedback from users about website usability.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When using the website, I want to feel welcomed and engaged, so I can enjoy my experience and feel a sense of belonging to the community.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: The existing website does not evoke a warm or engaging atmosphere.
pain_points: The website feels cold and uninviting.
Lack of community feel in the design and content.
desired_outcomes: A warm, inviting design that reflects community spirit.
Emotional connection with the club and its members.
success_criteria: Positive emotional responses from users about the website.
Increased sense of community among members.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I share my experiences online, I want to be seen as an engaged and informed community member, so I can enhance my social standing and connections.
social_jobs.current_solution: The current website does not facilitate sharing or community interaction effectively.
pain_points: Limited opportunities for social interaction on the site.
Difficulty in showing involvement in community events.
desired_outcomes: Easier ways to connect with others attending events.
A platform that supports community discussions and sharing.
success_criteria: More user-generated content on the website.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When managing my responsibilities in the club, I want to access customer support resources easily, so I can resolve issues quickly and effectively.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Current support options are limited and can be hard to locate.
pain_points: Lack of self-service resources for members.
Time-consuming process to find answers to simple questions.
desired_outcomes: A self-service support section that addresses common issues.
Quick access to help resources, such as a chatbot or FAQ.
success_criteria: Higher satisfaction rates among club members for support.
